title: How to Make Fried Siomai

steps.headline: Wrap 1 tablespoon of the mixture in a siomai wrapper.
Heat a cooking pot and pour-in cooking oil.
Deep fry the siomai in medium heat for 5 to 7 minutes or until the color of the wrapper turns golden brown.
Make a sauce of calamansi and soy sauce.

text: Mix all ingredients.  Wrap 1 tablespoon of the mixture in a siomai wrapper.  Pinch it together on top.  Heat a cooking pot and pour-in cooking oil.  Deep fry the siomai in medium heat for 5 to 7 minutes or until the color of the wrapper turns golden brown.  Make a sauce of calamansi and soy sauce.
